TextView.android:text: Startup launches app for short-time meditation based on mood

Startup Aura Health has launched 'Aura', an iOS app that creates up to 200 short three-to-seven-minute meditation sessions based on the user's current mood — be that stressed, anxious, happy or sad. The app collects data on demographics and age to better understand what type of meditation suits the user. It also provides users with a graph of their mood.
